00023 #include <Solv_Gen.h>

00029 Implemente_instanciable_sans_constructeur(Solv_Gen,"Solv_Gen",solv_iteratif);

00031 Solv_Gen::Solv_Gen()
00032 {
00033   seuil_ = _SEUIL_Gen_;
00034   nb_it_max_ = 1000000;
00035   nb_it_max_flag = 0;
00036   force_ = 0;
00037 }
00038 
00039 void Solv_Gen::reinit()
00040 {
00041   if(le_precond_.non_nul())
00042     {
00043       le_precond_.valeur().reinit();
00044     }
00045 }
00046 
00047 Sortie& Solv_Gen::printOn(Sortie& s ) const
00048 {
00049   s<<" { seuil "<<seuil_<< " solv_elem "<<le_solveur_elem_ << " precond "<< le_precond_;
00050   if (limpr()==1)
00051     s<< " impr ";
00052   if (limpr()==-1)
00053     s<< " quiet ";
00054   s <<" } ";
00055   return s ;
00056 }
00057 
00058 Entree& Solv_Gen::readOn(Entree& is )
00059 {
00060   Motcle accolade_ouverte("{");
00061   Motcle accolade_fermee("}");
00062   Motcles les_parametres(9);
00063   {
00064     les_parametres[0] = "seuil";
00065     les_parametres[1] = "impr";
00066     les_parametres[2] = "solv_elem";
00067     les_parametres[3] = "precond";
00068     les_parametres[4] = "save_matrice|save_matrix";
00069     les_parametres[5] = "quiet";
00070     les_parametres[6] = "nb_it_max";
00071     les_parametres[7] = "force";
00072     les_parametres[8] = "return";
00073   }
00074   int rang;
00075 
00076   Motcle motlu;
00077   is >> motlu;
00078   if (motlu != accolade_ouverte)
00079     {
00080       Cerr << "Error when reading the parameters for the generic solver " << finl;
00081       Cerr << "One expected : " << accolade_ouverte << finl;
00082       exit();
00083     }
00084   is >> motlu;
00085   save_matrice_=0;
00086   while (motlu != accolade_fermee)
00087     {
00088       rang = les_parametres.search(motlu);
00089       switch(rang)
00090         {
00091         case 0:
00092           {
00093             is >> seuil_;
00094             break;
00095           }
00096         case 1:
00097           {
00098             fixer_limpr(1);
00099             break;
00100           }
00101         case 2:
00102           {
00103             is >> le_solveur_elem_;
00104             break;
00105           }
00106         case 3:
00107           {
00108             is >> le_precond_;
00109             break;
00110           }
00111         case 4:
00112           {
00113             save_matrice_=1;
00114             break;
00115           }
00116         case 5:
00117           {
00118             fixer_limpr(-1);
00119             break;
00120           }
00121         case 6:
00122           {
00123             is>>nb_it_max_;
00124             nb_it_max_flag = 1;
00125             break;
00126           }
00127         case 7:
00128           {
00129             force_ = 1;
00130             break;
00131           }
00132         case 8:
00133           {
00134             return_on_error_ = 1;
00135             break;
00136           }
00137         default :
00138           {
00139             Cerr << "Error when reading the parameters of the generic solver " << finl;
00140             Cerr << "One expected " << les_parametres << " instead of " << motlu << finl;
00141             exit();
00142           }
00143         }
00144       is >> motlu;
00145     }
00146   if ((nb_it_max_flag ==0) && (force_==1) )
00147     {
00148       Cerr << "Error while reading the parameters of the generic solver " << finl;
00149       Cerr << "When you choose to 'force' negative ipar[5], you should specify nb_it_max in your datafile" << finl;
00150       exit();
00151     }
00152   return is;
00153 }

00158 int Solv_Gen::resoudre_systeme(const Matrice_Base& la_matrice,
00159                                const DoubleVect& secmem,
00160                                DoubleVect& solution)
00161 {
00162 
00163 // On definit tout nos vecteurs et leur dimension respective et nos constantes
00164 
00165 // n : la taille du systeme lineaire
00166   int n = secmem.size();
00167   if(solution.size() != n)
00168     {
00169       if( solution.size() ==0)
00170         solution.resize(n);
00171       else
00172         {
00173           Cerr << "Solv_Gen::resoudre_systeme : wrong dimension of the vectors" << finl;
00174           return(-1);
00175         }
00176     }
00177 // Cerr<<"La matrice : "<<la_matrice.que_suis_je()<<finl;
00178   if(sub_type(Matrice_Bloc,la_matrice))
00179     {
00180       const Matrice_Bloc& MB = ref_cast(Matrice_Bloc,la_matrice);
00181 
00182       const Matrice& MB00 = MB.get_bloc(0,0);
00183       if(sub_type(Matrice_Morse_Sym,MB00.valeur()))
00184         {
00185           const Matrice_Morse_Sym& M = ref_cast(Matrice_Morse_Sym,MB00.valeur());
00186           return solve(la_matrice,M,secmem,solution);
00187         }
00188       else if(sub_type(Matrice_Morse,MB00.valeur()))
00189         {
00190           const Matrice_Morse& mat = ref_cast(Matrice_Morse,MB00.valeur());
00191           return solve(la_matrice,mat,secmem,solution);
00192         }
00193       else
00194         {
00195           Cerr<<"ERROR SolvGen : one is not able to treat the case of a matrix"<<finl;
00196           Cerr<<"of type : "<<MB00.que_suis_je()<<finl;
00197           exit();
00198           return -1;
00199         }
00200     }
00201   else if(sub_type(Matrice_Morse_Sym,la_matrice))
00202     {
00203       const Matrice_Morse_Sym& M = ref_cast(Matrice_Morse_Sym,la_matrice);
00204       return solve(M,M,secmem,solution);
00205     }
00206   else if(sub_type(Matrice_Morse,la_matrice))
00207     {
00208       const Matrice_Morse& mat = ref_cast(Matrice_Morse,la_matrice);
00209       return solve(mat,mat,secmem,solution);
00210     }
00211   else
00212     {
00213       Cerr<<"ERROR SolvGen : one is not able to treat the case of a matrix"<<finl;
00214       Cerr<<"of type : "<<la_matrice.que_suis_je()<<finl;
00215       exit();
00216       return -1;
00217     }
00218 }
00219 
00220 int Solv_Gen::solve(const Matrice_Base& matrice,
00221                     const Matrice_Base& mat_loc,
00222                     const DoubleVect& secmem,
00223                     DoubleVect& solution)
00224 {
00225 // n : la taille du systeme lineaire
00226   int n = secmem.size();
00227   int ntot = secmem.size_array();
00228   int niter=0;
00229 // definition de ipar et fpar
00230   ArrOfInt ipar(16);
00231   ArrOfDouble fpar(16);
00232 
00233 
00234 // definition de w : vecteur de travail de taille 9*n
00235   ArrOfDouble w;
00236   le_solveur_elem_.dimensionne_wks(ntot,w);
00237 
00238 // Initialisation
00239   ipar[0] = 0; //on def tjrs cela pour commencer le calcul
00240   if(le_precond_.non_nul())
00241     {
00242       if(sub_type(ILU,le_precond_.valeur()))
00243         {
00244           ILU& pilu = ref_cast(ILU,le_precond_.valeur());
00245           ipar[1] = pilu.type_precond();
00246         }
00247       else
00248         ipar[1]=1;
00249     }
00250   else
00251     ipar[1]=0;
00252   ipar[2] = 1; //!< pour le test de convergence
00253   ipar[2] = 2;
00254   ipar[3] = w.size_array();; //taille maximale de w
00255   ipar[4] = 10;
00256   int nmax = max(Process::mp_sum(n), 100);
00257   ipar[5] = nmax; //!< nb max de produit matrice vect si nb negatif on s arrete a la convergence Si gros calcul (Process::mp_sum(n)>2147483647), specifier nb_it_max et imposer ipar[5] = -1 on le fait desormais en specifiant le mot cle 'force' dans le jdd
00258 //
00259 //
00260 //
00261   if (force_ ==1) ipar[5] = -1;
00262 
00263   fpar[0] = seuil_; //!< tolerance relative
00264   fpar[0]= 1e-50 ; //!< GF les autres solveurs n'ont pas de tol relative
00265   fpar[1] = seuil_; //!< tolerance absolue
00266   fpar[10] = 0; //!< initialisation du compteur
00267 
00268 // solution = 1.0;
00269   le_solveur_elem_.iteration(ntot,secmem,solution,ipar,fpar,w);
00270   solution.echange_espace_virtuel();
00271 
00272   DoubleTab W7, W8;
00273 
00274   {
00275 // fait pointer v sur la sous partie qui commence a ipar[7]-1, de taille ntot:
00276     W7.ref_array(w, ipar[7]-1, ntot);
00277 // Remarque TUTU: resize autorise car il ne change pas la taille et necessaire
00278 // pour initialiser line_size() du tableau W7:
00279     W7.resize(ntot/secmem.line_size(), secmem.line_size());
00280     W7.set_md_vector(secmem.get_md_vector());
00281     W7.echange_espace_virtuel();
00282   }
00283 
00284   int ret = ipar[0];
00285 
00286   while(ret != 0 && niter < nb_it_max_ )
00287     {
00288       niter++;
00289       W7.ref_array(w, ipar[7]-1, ntot);
00290       W7.resize(ntot/secmem.line_size(), secmem.line_size()); //idem remarque TUTU
00291       W7.set_md_vector(secmem.get_md_vector());
00292       W8.ref_array(w, ipar[8]-1, ntot);
00293       W8.resize(ntot/secmem.line_size(), secmem.line_size()); //idem remarque TUTU
00294       W8.set_md_vector(secmem.get_md_vector());
00295       if (ret != 4 && ret != 6)
00296         W7.echange_espace_virtuel();
00297 
00298       if(ret==1)
00299         {
00300 // on doit calculer le produit A*u
00301 // int ii;
00302           matrice.multvect(W7, W8);
00303           le_solveur_elem_.iteration(ntot,secmem,solution,ipar,fpar,w);
00304           solution.echange_espace_virtuel();
00305         }
00306       else if(ret==2)
00307         {
00308           exit();
00309 // on doit calculer le produit At*u
00310 // matrice.multvectT(u, s);
00311 // int ii;
00312           matrice.multvectT(W7, W8);
00313           le_solveur_elem_.iteration(ntot,secmem,solution,ipar,fpar,w);
00314           solution.echange_espace_virtuel();
00315         }
00316       else if((ret == 3) || (ret == 5))
00317         {
00318 // On preconditionne
00319 // int ii;
00320           if(sub_type(ILU,le_precond_.valeur()))
00321             le_precond_.preconditionner(mat_loc, W7, W8);
00322           else
00323             le_precond_.preconditionner(mat_loc,secmem,solution);
00324 // le_precond_.preconditionner(matrice,secmem,solution);
00325           le_solveur_elem_.iteration(ntot,secmem,solution,ipar,fpar,w);
00326           solution.echange_espace_virtuel();
00327         }
00328       else if((ret == 4) || (ret == 6))
00329         {
00330           exit();
00331 // On preconditionne
00332           if(sub_type(ILU,le_precond_.valeur()))
00333             le_precond_.preconditionner(mat_loc, W7, W8);
00334           else
00335             le_precond_.preconditionner(mat_loc,secmem,solution);
00336 
00337           le_solveur_elem_.iteration(ntot,secmem,solution,ipar,fpar,w);
00338           solution.echange_espace_virtuel();
00339         }
00340       else if(ret == 10)
00341         {
00342           Cout<<"Case 10"<<finl;
00343           Cout<<"The predefined stop test is retained"<<finl;
00344           le_solveur_elem_.iteration(ntot,secmem,solution,ipar,fpar,w);
00345           solution.echange_espace_virtuel();
00346         }
00347       else if(ret > 0)
00348         {
00349           Cerr<<"Case > 0"<<finl;
00350           Cerr<<"That code does not exist "<<finl;
00351           exit();
00352           return(-1);
00353         }
00354       else if(ret < 0)
00355         {
00356           Cerr<<"ERROR in SolvGen"<<finl;
00357           Cerr<<" The solver terminates with code number "<<ret<<finl;
00358           if(ret==-1)
00359             {
00360               Cerr<<"Stop since the iteration number "<<finl;
00361               Cerr<<"is greater than the preset limit"<<finl;
00362             }
00363           else if(ret==-2)
00364             {
00365               Cerr<<"return due to insufficient work space"<<finl;
00366             }
00367           else if(ret==-3)
00368             {
00369               Cerr<<"return due to anticipated break-down / divide by zero"<<finl;
00370               Cerr<<"ipar[11] : "<<ipar[11]<<finl;
00371               Cerr<<"w : "<<w<<finl;
00372               Cerr<<"ind = fpar[1O] : "<<fpar[10]<<finl;
00373             }
00374           else if(ret==-4)
00375             {
00376               Cerr<<"the values of fpar(1) and fpar(2) are both <= 0, "<<finl;
00377               Cerr<<"the valid ranges are 0 <= fpar(1) < 1, 0 <= fpar(2), "<<finl;
00378               Cerr<<"and they can not be zero at the same time"<<finl;
00379             }
00380           else if(ret==-9)
00381             {
00382               Cerr<<"while trying to detect a break-down, "<<finl;
00383               Cerr<<"an abnormal number is detected"<<finl;
00384             }
00385           else if(ret==-10)
00386             {
00387               Cerr<<"return due to some non-numerical reasons, "<<finl;
00388               Cerr<<"e.g. invalid floating-point numbers etc."<<finl;
00389             }
00390           if (!return_on_error_) exit();
00391           return(-1);
00392         }
00393       ret = ipar[0];
00394       if(limpr()==1)
00395         {
00396 // Cerr<<"++ Cas : "<<ret<<finl;
00397 // Cerr<<"fpar(5) -- current residual norm (if available) : "<<fpar[4]<<finl;
00398 // Cerr<<"fpar(6) -- current residual/error norm : "<<fpar[5]<<finl;
00399           Cout<< fpar[5]<<" ";
00400           if (niter%10==0) Cout<<finl;
00401         }
00402     }
00403 
00404   if (je_suis_maitre())
00405     {
00406 // Cerr<<"--------------------------------------------------"<<finl;
00407       if (limpr()>-1)
00408         {
00409           if (niter == nb_it_max_)
00410             {
00411               Cout<<finl<<"Maximum number of iteration nb_it_max for SolvGen = "<<nb_it_max_ << " reached..." <<finl;
00412               if (nb_it_max_flag == 0) Cout<<"Advice: You can modify nb_it_max by setting it in your datafile..." <<finl;
00413             }
00414 // Cout<<finl<<"End of the resolution by SolvGen after "<<niter <<" iterations, current residual/error norm "<<fpar[5]<<" initial residual/error norm "<<fpar[2]<<finl;
00415           double residu_relatif = (fpar[2] > 0 ? fpar[5] / fpar[2] : fpar[5]);
00416           Cout << finl << "Final residue: " << fpar[5] << " ( " << residu_relatif << " )"<<finl;
00417         }
00418 // Cerr<<"fpar(3) -- initial residual/error norm : "<<fpar[2]<<finl;
00419 // Cerr<<"fpar(4) -- target residual/error norm : "<<fpar[3]<<finl;
00420 // Cerr<<"fpar(5) -- current residual norm (if available) : "<<fpar[4]<<finl;
00421 // Cerr<<"fpar(6) -- current residual/error norm : "<<fpar[5]<<finl;
00422 // Cerr<<"fpar(7) -- convergence rate : "<<fpar[6]<<finl;
00423     }
00424 
00425   if (0)
00426     {
00427       DoubleVect tmp(solution);
00428       matrice.multvect(solution,tmp);
00429       int ii;
00430       /*
00431         Process::Journal()<<" A = "<<matrice<<finl;
00432         Process::Journal()<<" ipar = "<<finl;
00433         for(ii=0;ii<ipar.size_array();ii++)
00434         Process::Journal()<<ii<<": "<<ipar[ii]<<finl;
00435         Process::Journal()<<" w = "<<finl;
00436         for(ii=0;ii<w.size_array();ii++)
00437         Process::Journal()<<ii<<": "<<w[ii]<<finl;
00438         Process::Journal()<<" x = "<<solution<<finl;
00439         //     solution.ecrit(Process::Journal());
00440         Process::Journal()<<" A*x = "<<tmp<<finl;
00441         Process::Journal()<<" b = "<<secmem<<finl;
00442         tmp.ecrit(Process::Journal());
00443       */
00444       for(ii=0; ii<solution.size(); ii++)
00445         tmp(ii)-=secmem(ii);
00446       tmp.echange_espace_virtuel();
00447       double err=0.;
00448       for(ii=0; ii<solution.size(); ii++)
00449         err+=(tmp(ii)*tmp(ii));
00450       err = Process::mp_sum(err);
00451       Cerr<<"ERROR: "<<sqrt(err)<<finl;
00452     }
00453   return niter;
00454 }
